data.title: Super Track Experience - Drive a Lamborghini
data.meta_description: Drive exotic supercars on real race tracks across the United States with Xtreme Xperience. Choose from the world's best car manufacturers!
data.text:
This is no longer the stuff of fantasy… You get to choose your favorite exotics from our hand picked line-up including the Ferrari 488 GTB, Lamborghini Huracan LP610-4, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Audi R8 V10 Performance, Porsche 718 Cayman GT4, Corvette Stingray Z51, Dodge Challenger Hellcat Widebody or Nissan GT-R and drive them on a real racetrack with no speed limits. Experience exotic cars the way they were meant to be – on a real racetrack. Track Insurance is required to drive and starts as low as $39.

To book a Ride-Along, simply proceed with booking an Xperience. After you select your location, car, date and time, choose to decline Track Insurance which is required for Drivers.

Choose Any Supercar

Drive On a Real Racetrack

Or Ride with a Professional Driver

3 to 4 Adrenaline-Pumping Laps per Session

No Speed Limits

Includes Classroom Session & Pro Instruction

Motorsports Helmet Provided

Track Insurance Required for Drivers from $39

SUPERCAR DRIVING XPERIENCE:

Get behind the wheel of one of our supercars as the DRIVER in this high-speed 3 to 4-lap experience. After a brief instructional course you’ll head out on the track to drive your sessions and join the select few who can say they’ve driven the world’s best supercars. Must be 18 with a valid driver’s license to drive. Track Insurance is required to drive and starts as low as $39.

SUPERCAR RIDE-ALONG XPERIENCE:

Hop in the passenger seat and ride shotgun as one of our professional drivers speeds you around the course for the thrill ride of a lifetime! Perfect for anyone who wants to feel what the world’s best supercars can do in the skilled hands of a professional. Available to anyone 12 years or older and 54 inches or taller.*

*Must be 18 to Ride-Along at Autobahn Country Club, New Jersey Motorsports Park, and Raceway Park Englishtown, NJ.

Real Racetracks

At the Supercar Track Xperience, you’ll drive your dream cars on some of the best racetracks in the U.S. With Xperiences hosted at 35+ racetracks across the US, you’re sure to find us at a track near you.

Each track features a variety of hair-raising turns, straight-aways, elevation changes, camber, curbing and safety features. Most drivers will blow past triple digit speeds and truly test each supercar's mind-blowing acceleration, speed, braking and cornering abilities.

View The Tracks

Real Instruction

Your instruction begins with a short classroom session to teach racing fundamentals and safety. Once it’s time to drive, your instructor will join you in the right seat to provide real-time feedback via two-way communicator and hand signals to enhance your driving skills and help you go faster.

Xtreme Xperience employs professional racing instructors who know every inch of the track you’re driving. Their goal is to help you drive the racing line, brake, corner and accelerate at just the right time to achieve optimum speeds.

Meet Our Pro Instructors
